site.title: Next.js
site.description: Next.js is a React framework that enables functionality such as server-side rendering and generating static websites for React-based web applications.

site.title: MongoDB
site.description: MongoDB is a document database, which means it stores data in JSON-like documents. It provides a rich set of features and is known for its scalability.

site.title: Tailwind CSS
site.description: Tailwind CSS is a utility-first CSS framework for rapidly building custom user interfaces. It emphasizes responsive design by default and provides a wide range of classes for styling.

site.title: Framer Motion
site.description: Framer Motion is a React library for creating powerful animations and interactions. It offers a simplified declarative syntax for defining animations in a React environment.

site.title: Plausible
site.description: Plausible is a privacy-focused, open-source web analytics tool. It provides website owners with essential metrics while respecting user privacy and not using cookies.

site.title: Microlink/mql
site.description: Microlink/mql is an API service for turning websites into structured data. It simplifies the process of extracting data from websites, making it useful for various applications like creating rich previews or automating data collection.

software.title: VSCode
software.description: Visual Studio Code is a streamlined code editor with support for development operations like debugging, task running, and version control. It aims to provide the tools a developer needs for a quick code-build-debug cycle.

software.title: Postman
software.description: Postman is an API platform for building and using APIs. Postman simplifies each step of the API lifecycle and streamlines collaboration so you can create better APIs—faster.

software.title: Slack
software.description: Slack is a new way to communicate with your team. It’s faster, better organized, and more secure than email.

software.title: MySQL Workbench
software.description: MySQL Workbench is a unified visual tool for database architects, developers, and DBAs. MySQL Workbench provides data modeling, SQL development, and comprehensive administration tools for server configuration, user administration, and much more.

tech_stack.title: SASS
tech_stack.description: SASS is a powerful CSS preprocessor that helps to keep stylesheets well-organized and makes it easier to share design within and across projects.

tech_stack.title: React
tech_stack.description: React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces. It allows developers to create large web applications that can change data, without reloading the page.

tech_stack.title: Redux
tech_stack.description: Redux is a predictable state container for JavaScript apps. It helps you write applications that behave consistently and are easy to test.

tech_stack.title: JavaScript (JS)
tech_stack.description: JavaScript is a programming language that enables interactive web pages. It is a part of most web browsers and allows for client-side script to interact with the user.

tech_stack.title: Material UI
tech_stack.description: Material UI is a popular React UI framework that implements Google's Material Design. It provides a set of components that helps in building consistent UIs.

tech_stack.title: Chakra UI
tech_stack.description: Chakra UI is a simple, modular, and accessible component library that gives you all the building blocks you need to build your React applications.

tech_stack.title: MySQL
tech_stack.description: MySQL is one of the world's most popular relational database management systems. It is reliable, scalable, and easy to use.

tech_stack.title: Knex
tech_stack.description: Knex.js is a SQL query builder for JavaScript, designed to be flexible, portable, and fun to use. It supports traditional node callbacks, promises, and async/await.

tech_stack.title: Node.js
tech_stack.description: Node.js is a JavaScript runtime built on Chrome's V8 JavaScript engine. It allows developers to build scalable network applications in JavaScript.

tech_stack.title: Express.js
tech_stack.description: Express.js is a minimal and flexible Node.js web application framework that provides a robust set of features for web and mobile applications.
